text: Ivan Pavlov () is a 1949 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Roshal.Академик Иван ПавловАкадемик Иван Павлов (1949) It stars Aleksandr Borisov, Nina Alisova, and Nikolai Plotnikov. ==Actors== * Aleksandr Borisov as Ivan Petrovich Pavlov * Nina Alisova as Varvara Antonovna Ivanova * Nikolai Plotnikov as Nikodin Vasilyevich * Maryana Safonova as Sarafina Pavlova * Fyodor Nikitin as Gleb Mikhailovich Zvantsev * Grigory Shpigel as Professor Petrushev == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1949 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Roshal
title: Ivan Pavlov (movie)
